titleInfo.title: Online Appendix I: Methodological questions and exemplary analysis

mods.abstract: This is part of the Online Appendix of the book Talking Collective Action. This appendix is intended for readers of the book interested in a more practical application of methodology; it provides an exemplary analysis that follows the method of sequential analysis described in the book. The appendix also attempts to anticipate some of the potential criticism of objective hermeneutics by conversation analysts and draws on arguments from ethnomethodology to do so.
